QuestData.Title: Starfall Village
QuestData.Description: You've been pretty busy around here. If you're still eager to do good deeds, or just get paid, I've got something you might be interested in.$B$BStarfall Village is just northwest of Everlook. The night elves there recently suffered a pretty nasty bug infestation, and they're asking for any help they can get.$B$BA few goblins from here already went there to start exterminating, but I'm sure there's room for more. Talk to Wynd Nightchaser, he'll fill you in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Wynd Nightchaser at Starfall Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Starfall, $c. We have opened our doors to all travelers in our time of need.
